name: <red>Press Advantage</>
desc: Gain another action after fighting at weapon advantage.
components: (combat_calcs.compute_advantage(unit, target, item, target.get_weapon()) and combat_calcs.compute_advantage(unit, target, item, target.get_weapon()).accuracy > 0) or (combat_calcs.compute_advantage(unit, target, item, target.get_weapon(), False) and combat_calcs.compute_advantage(unit, target, item, target.get_weapon(), False).accuracy > 0)
